Enumeration# Unicode.ASCII

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
@frozen
enum ASCII
```

## [Topics](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#Structures)

[`struct Parser`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/parser)### [Type Aliases](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias CodeUnit`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/codeunit)The basic unit of encoding[`typealias EncodedScalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/encodedscalar)A valid scalar value as represented in this encoding[`typealias ForwardParser`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/forwardparser)A type that can be used to parse `CodeUnits` into `EncodedScalar`s.[`typealias ReverseParser`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/reverseparser)A type that can be used to parse a reversed sequence of `CodeUnits` into `EncodedScalar`s.### [Type Properties](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#Type-Properties)

[`static var encodedReplacementCharacter: Unicode.ASCII.EncodedScalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/encodedreplacementcharacter)A unicode scalar value to be used when repairing encoding/decoding errors, as represented in this encoding.### [Type Methods](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#Type-Methods)

[`static func decode(Unicode.ASCII.EncodedScalar) -> Unicode.Scalar`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/decode(_:))Converts from encoded to encoding-independent representation[`static func encode(Unicode.Scalar) -> Unicode.ASCII.EncodedScalar?`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/encode(_:))Converts from encoding-independent to encoded representation, returning `nil` if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.[`static func isASCII(Unicode.ASCII.CodeUnit) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/isascii(_:))Returns whether the given code unit represents an ASCII scalar[`static func transcode<FromEncoding>(FromEncoding.EncodedScalar, from: FromEncoding.Type) -> Unicode.ASCII.EncodedScalar?`](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii/transcode(_:from:))Converts a scalar from another encoding’s representation, returning `nil` if the scalar can’t be represented in this encoding.## [Relationships](/documentation/swift/unicode/ascii#relationships)
